response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you and align with your needs. Given its value to you, I propose a special introductory offer of $14,500 for this exceptional item. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can bring this product into your possession soon.", "product_price": 14500}
